trans-unit.source: Move the reverser lever to the full reverse position and press 'Next'.
trans-unit.target: Move the reverser lever to the full reverse position and press 'Next'.

trans-unit.target: Move the combined brake / throttle lever to the full brake position and press 'Next'.

trans-unit.target: Move the dynamic brake lever to the release position and press 'Next'.

trans-unit.target: Move the dynamic brake lever to the emergency position and press 'Next'.

trans-unit.target: Move the independant brake lever to the release position and press 'Next'.

trans-unit.target: Move and hold the bail-off lever into the full position and press 'Next'.

trans-unit.source: WARNING: If you enable Input Device Plugin(s), these may conflict with one or more controls.
trans-unit.target: WARNING: If you enable Input Device Plugin(s), these may conflict with one or more controls.

trans-unit.source:
Some issues were encountered while loading the route and train.

As some files could not be found, the route or train might not appear as intended. Try to redownload the route and train packages in order to ensure that you have a complete distribution.

The following list of issues might give additional information. You can still start the route by selecting "Ignore" from below.
trans-unit.target:
Alguns problemas foram encontrados ao carregar a linha e o trem.

Como alguns arquivos não foram encontrados, a linha e/ou trem podem não aparecer corretamente. Tente obter novamente a linha e/ou o trem para garantir que dispõe do pacote completo.

A seguinte lista de problemas pode fornecer informações adicionais. Você pode, ainda assim, iniciar a simulação selecionando "Ignorar" na tecla abaixo.

trans-unit.source: Some issues were encountered while loading the route and train. If you are the route or train developer, it might be worth taking a look at the following list of issues.\r\n\r\nAs a regular user, you can select "Ignore" at this point to start the game.
trans-unit.target: Alguns problemas foram encontrados ao carregar a linha e o trem. Caso seja o autor da linha ou do trem, talvez valha a pena verificar à seguinte lista de problemas.\r\n\r\nComo utilizador pode selecionar "Ignorar" para poder iniciar a simulação.

trans-unit.source: You may proceed at [speed] [unit] with extreme caution.
trans-unit.target: Pode prosseguir a [speed] [unit] com extrema precaução.

trans-unit.source: You have passed a stop signal. Please apply the emergency brakes immediately and come to a complete hold.
trans-unit.target: Passou um sinal de pare. Por favor acione imediatamente os freios de emergência e pare.

trans-unit.source: The signal indicates a speed limit of [limit] [unit]. You are currently traveling at [speed] [unit]. Please slow down.
trans-unit.target: O sinal indica um limite de velocidade de [limit] [unit]. Atualmente a sua velocidade é de [speed] [unit]. Por favor diminua.

trans-unit.source: The speed post indicates a speed limit of [limit] [unit]. You are currently traveling at [speed] [unit]. Please slow down.
trans-unit.target: O limite de velocidade desta linha é de [limit] [unit]. Atualmente a sua velocidade é de [speed] [unit]. Por favor diminua.

trans-unit.source: You have arrived at [name] and are [time] late.
You have arrived at [name] and are [time] early.

trans-unit.target: Por favor corrija a sua posição de parada.

trans-unit.source: Boarding complete. You may close the doors now.
trans-unit.target: Já pode fechar as portas e partir.

trans-unit.source: You have passed [name] where you should have stopped.
You have passed [name] while still boarding. Please come to a complete hold immediately.
trans-unit.target: Passou [name] durante o embarque. Por favor faça uma parada completa imediatamente.

trans-unit.source: This feature is not available in Expert mode.
trans-unit.target: Esta função não está disponível na modalidade de Perito.

trans-unit.source: The AI might be unable to fully operate this train.
trans-unit.target: O AI pode não ser capaz de operar plenamente este trem.

trans-unit.source: Do you really want to exit to the main menu?
trans-unit.target: Quer mesmo voltar ao menu principal?

trans-unit.source: Do you really want to quit?

trans-unit.source: BrakeNotches must be at least 1 if HoldBrake is set.
trans-unit.target: BrakeNotches must be at least 1 if HoldBrake is set.

trans-unit.source: DriverPowerNotches must be less than or equal to PowerNotches.
trans-unit.target: DriverPowerNotches must be less than or equal to PowerNotches.

trans-unit.source: DriverBrakeNotches must be less than or equal to BrakeNotches.
trans-unit.target: DriverBrakeNotches must be less than or equal to BrakeNotches.

trans-unit.source: DriverCar must be less than NumberOfMotorCars + NumberOfTrailerCars.
trans-unit.target: DriverCar must be less than NumberOfMotorCars + NumberOfTrailerCars.

trans-unit.source: NumberOfTrailerCars must be at least 1 if FrontCarIsAMotorCar is not set.
trans-unit.target: NumberOfTrailerCars must be at least 1 if FrontCarIsAMotorCar is not set.
